text: Chief Justice of India T.S. Thakur (second right) inaugurates the Regional Centres of the Tamil Nadu Judicial Academy at Coimbatore and Madurai from the academy in Coimbatore on Sunday. Chief Justice of the Madras High Court S.K. Kaul (second left) is in the picture. — Photo: S. Siva Saravanan
title: Enforcement is crucial, says Thakur
